response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you.

I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $2,000,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to secure a high-quality solution at a competitive advantage in the market.

Please consider this offer carefully, as I understand that making such a significant investment is not taken lightly. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.

Looking forward to the possibility of working with you,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
